attributes.action: Total NHS Overhaul, Switch to Patient Focus and Complete Holistic Health Care as Top Priority, Funding Secondary.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To use a fully Holistic Patient Focus approach to ALL NHS without fear of funding, allowing total Diagnosis to tackle all patient ailments with regularly screening to start to address all current problems within the individual; further direct medical research (Via Database of diagnosis) to areas of biggest concern population wise; record genetic material for long-term research with intent to improve all humanity and use the Current Diagnosis to implement personalised preventative health plans for individual to maximise their health long-term.

Healthy populations, free from stress and disease are a productive and beneficial to society.
